headline.main: Mexico's Capital Pays Last Farewell to Singer Juan Gabriel
headline.print_headline: Mexico's Capital Pays Last Farewell to Singer Juan Gabriel

docs.snippet: Fans of Juan Gabriel lined the streets of Mexico City to pay their last respects to the singer as a motorcade carried his ashes to a farewell ceremony Monday at the capital's Palace of Fine Arts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans of Juan Gabriel lined the streets of Mexico City to pay their last respects to the singer as a motorcade carried his ashes to a farewell ceremony Monday at the capital's Palace of Fine Arts.

headline.main: Theresa May Rules Out Immigration Plan That ‘Brexit’ Backers Espoused

docs.snippet: The British prime minister rejected a points-based system in giving her first, tentative details on plans for Britain’s withdrawal, but remained fuzzy on much else....
docs.abstract: British Prime Min Theresa May affirms Britain will not adopt points-based immigration policy used by Australia and favored by prominent supporters of withdrawal from European Union; May's comments both uphold and soften pledge to curb immigration, pointing to difficult balancing act she faces as she seeks exit from EU without damaging economy.
docs.lead_paragraph: The British prime minister rejected a points-based system in giving her first, tentative details on plans for Britain’s withdrawal, but remained fuzzy on much else.

headline.main: Berisha Scores as Kosovo Draw With Finland in First Qualifier
headline.print_headline: Berisha Scores as Kosovo Draw With Finland in First Qualifier

docs.snippet: Kosovo's Valon Berisha, given permission to play only a few hours before kickoff, scored for his country in their first-ever competitive international to give them a 1-1 draw away to Finland in a World Cup qualifier on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kosovo's Valon Berisha, given permission to play only a few hours before kickoff, scored for his country in their first-ever competitive international to give them a 1-1 draw away to Finland in a World Cup qualifier on Wednesday.

headline.main: Ruthless Spain Maul Liechtenstein to Lay Down Marker
headline.print_headline: Ruthless Spain Maul Liechtenstein to Lay Down Marker

docs.snippet: Spain started their World Cup qualifying campaign with a crushing 8-0 win over Liechtenstein, laying down a marker in Group G with a ruthless second-half display on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain started their World Cup qualifying campaign with a crushing 8-0 win over Liechtenstein, laying down a marker in Group G with a ruthless second-half display on Monday.

headline.main: Shot Policeman's Condition Upgraded From Critical to Stable
headline.print_headline: Shot Policeman's Condition Upgraded From Critical to Stable

docs.snippet: A police officer who responded to a robbery in progress at a casino garage over the weekend and was shot and wounded has been upgraded from critical to stable condition, authorities said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A police officer who responded to a robbery in progress at a casino garage over the weekend and was shot and wounded has been upgraded from critical to stable condition, authorities said Monday.

headline.main: With NFL Career on Hold, Manziel Re-enrolls at Texas A&M
headline.print_headline: With NFL Career on Hold, Manziel Re-enrolls at Texas A&M

docs.snippet: Former Cleveland quarterback Johnny Manziel has re-enrolled at Texas A&M after his NFL career was derailed by a series of off-field incidents that included a domestic violence charge still pending in court....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Cleveland quarterback Johnny Manziel has re-enrolled at Texas A&M after his NFL career was derailed by a series of off-field incidents that included a domestic violence charge still pending in court.

headline.main: Bale Spurs Wales to Comfortable 4-0 Win Over Moldova
headline.print_headline: Bale Spurs Wales to Comfortable 4-0 Win Over Moldova

docs.snippet: Wales talisman Gareth Bale set up the first goal and scored twice, including a late penalty, as the Euro 2016 semi-finalists won 4-0 in their opening Group D World Cup qualifier on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wales talisman Gareth Bale set up the first goal and scored twice, including a late penalty, as the Euro 2016 semi-finalists won 4-0 in their opening Group D World Cup qualifier on Monday.

docs.snippet: Retirement and health-care funds run by the United Mine Workers of America currently support about 120,000 former miners and their families nationwide, but account balances have dwindled amid continued layoffs and bankruptcy filings as the coal in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Retirement and health-care funds run by the United Mine Workers of America currently support about 120,000 former miners and their families nationwide, but account balances have dwindled amid continued layoffs and bankruptcy filings as the coal industry struggles against competition from cheaper natural gas and tightening environmental regulations. Without intervention, some of the funds could run out of cash by next year, the union says.

headline.main: Surgeon Helps Save Heart Attack Victim in Car Crash
headline.print_headline: Surgeon Helps Save Heart Attack Victim in Car Crash

headline.main: Review: In FX’s ‘Atlanta,’ a Princeton Dropout Works the Angles Back Home
headline.print_headline: Back Home, Crashing on a Couch and Dreaming of Rap Greatness

docs.snippet: Donald Glover stars in this dry, offbeat comedy about the expansive territory between rags and riches....
docs.abstract: James Poniewozik reviews FX television show Atlanta created by and starring Donald Glover.
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Glover stars in this dry, offbeat comedy about the expansive territory between rags and riches.
